import React, {isValidElement, useEffect, useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function EventDetail() { const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetchEventId(); }, []); const [item, setItems] = useState([]); const fetchEventId = async () => { const data = await fetch(`/events/${id}`); const item = await data.json(); console.log(item); setItems(item); } return (
